Sentece: Agmatine persisted at near maximum concentrations in all levels of the spinal cord for several hours with a half-life of approximately 12 h.
Title: Pharmacodynamic and pharmacokinetic studies of agmatine after spinal administration in the mouse.
Name: Agmatine

Sentece: However, the serum half-life was less than 10 min after intrathecal injection of agmatine, consistent with previous preliminary pharmacokinetic reports of systemically administered agmatine.
Title: Pharmacodynamic and pharmacokinetic studies of agmatine after spinal administration in the mouse.
Name: Agmatine
